reg_pit.title: Permitted Cost of Services (Olympic Number Plates) Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 2/2017, effective January 18, 2017.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Permitted Cost of Services (Olympic Number Plates) Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 17 (1) of the Insurance Corporation Act, the corporation's permitted costs of its services are as follows:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: in relation to the fee collected under item 3 (c) (ii) of the Schedule to the Commercial Transport Fees Regulation, $17;
in relation to the fee collected under item 3 (c) (iii) or (iv) of the Schedule to the Commercial Transport Fees Regulation, the entire amount of that fee;
in relation to the fee collected under item 14 (a) of the Schedule to the Motor Vehicle Fees Regulation, $17;
in relation to the fee collected under item 14 (b) or (c) of the Schedule to the Motor Vehicle Fees Regulation, the entire amount of that fee.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Insurance Corporation Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 228, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: sectionÂ 17]
